if the sign in window does not appear.

home.empty: You don't have any tokens yet.

sidebar.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?

token.removeAssetConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this asset?

shop.empty: This user doesn't have any tokens yet.

order.termsAndPolicyLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions below and proceed with the order.
order.termsAndPolicyDetail:
- Purpose of collection and use of personal information: customer guidance for payment
- Items of personal information to be collected: mobile phone number
- Period of retention and use of personal information: Until the purpose of use of personal information is achieved (However, if there is a need for preservation according to the relevant laws and regulations, or if prior consent is obtained, until the relevant retention period)
- You may refuse to consent to the collection and use of personal information, in which case purchase will be restricted.

If the payment is successful, the NFT will be transferred to your wallet within 12 hours.
If payment is successful but NFT stock is exhausted, payment may be refunded.

payment.willBeTransfered: The purchased NFT will be sent to the connected wallet address within 24 hours.
payment.willBeRefunded: If your purchase is unsuccessful due to temporarily running out of stock, your credit card payment will be refunded.
payment.errorText1: Error has occurred proccessing your transaction.

my-page.empty: You haven't placed any orders yet.
